languages.text: "Разве мало того, что она уже ворует из казны?.. Кхм, прошу простить. Конечно, я обо всем позабочусь. Что именно вы желаете преподнести своей достойной спутнице? Учитывая ее вызывающую тягу к роскоши, подарок должен быть воистину особенным".

"Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."
languages.original_text: "Разве мало того, что она уже ворует из казны?.. Кхм, прошу простить. Конечно, я обо всем позабочусь. Что именно вы желаете преподнести своей достойной спутнице? Учитывая ее вызывающую тягу к роскоши, подарок должен быть воистину особенным".

"Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

"Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

languages.text: "Reicht es ihr nicht, aus unseren Truhen zu stehlen? Äh, ich bitte demütigst um Verzeihung. Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich werde mich um alles kümmern. Dürfte ich erfahren, was Ihr für Eure geschätzte Gefährtin im Sinn hattet? Angesichts ihrer auffälligen Vorliebe für Luxus müsste das Geschenk schon etwas Bemerkenswertes sein."
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Reicht es ihr nicht, aus unseren Truhen zu stehlen? Äh, ich bitte demütigst um Verzeihung. Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich werde mich um alles kümmern. Dürfte ich erfahren, was Ihr für Eure geschätzte Gefährtin im Sinn hattet? Angesichts ihrer auffälligen Vorliebe für Luxus müsste das Geschenk schon etwas Bemerkenswertes sein."

languages.text: « Se servir dans nos coffres ne lui suffit donc pas ? Hum, je vous prie de m'excuser. Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie, je m'occupe de tout. Puis-je vous demander ce que vous aviez en tête pour votre honorable amie ? Connaissant son penchant notable pour le luxe, votre cadeau devra être tout à fait remarquable. »
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

traits.locale_text: « Se servir dans nos coffres ne lui suffit donc pas ? Hum, je vous prie de m'excuser. Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie, je m'occupe de tout. Puis-je vous demander ce que vous aviez en tête pour votre honorable amie ? Connaissant son penchant notable pour le luxe, votre cadeau devra être tout à fait remarquable. »

languages.text: “她一直都从我们的国库里偷钱，难道她还不知满足吗？咳咳，我谦卑地向您道歉。没问题，大人，这件事情我会安排好的。请问，您对您尊敬的同伴有什么想法吗？鉴于她对奢侈品的明显爱好，这件礼物必须不同凡响。”
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

traits.locale_text: “她一直都从我们的国库里偷钱，难道她还不知满足吗？咳咳，我谦卑地向您道歉。没问题，大人，这件事情我会安排好的。请问，您对您尊敬的同伴有什么想法吗？鉴于她对奢侈品的明显爱好，这件礼物必须不同凡响。”

languages.text: 「あの者は金庫から盗むだけでは飽き足りないのですか？オホン、大変申し訳ございません。すべて確実に手配いたします、陛下。大切なお仲間についてお心当たりを伺ってもよろしいでしょうか？彼女のぜいたく好みを考えますと、贈り物は何か並外れたものがよろしいでしょうな」
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「金庫から盗むだけでは飽き足らんのか？オホン、大変申し訳ございません。確かに、全て手配いたします、陛下。大切なお仲間についてお心当たりを伺ってもよろしいでしょうか？彼女の顕著なぜいたく好みを考えますと、贈り物は何か並外れたものがよろしいでしょうな」

languages.text: «¿No le llega con robar de nuestras arcas? Ejem, le pido disculpas. Naturalmente, {mf|milord|milady}, me encargaré de ello. ¿Tiene algo en mente para su estimada compañera? A juzgar por su notoria preferencia por los artículos lujosos, sería conveniente regalarle algo que esté a la altura».
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."

traits.locale_text: «¿No le llega con robar de nuestras arcas? Ejem, le pido disculpas. Naturalmente, {mf|milord|milady}, me encargaré de ello. ¿Tiene algo en mente para su estimada compañera? A juzgar por su notoria preferencia por los artículos lujosos, sería conveniente regalarle algo que esté a la altura».

languages.text: "Kasalarımızı tırtıklamak yetmemiş mi? Ehem, naçizane özürlerimi kabul edin. Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her şeyi halledeceğim. Değerli yoldaşınız için aklınızda nasıl bir hediye olduğunu sorabilir miyim? Lükse yatkınlığını göz önüne alırsak hediyenin gerçekten dikkate değer bir şey olması gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Is she not satisfied with stealing from our coffers? Ahem, I humbly apologise. Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, all will be taken care of. Might I ask what you had in mind for your esteemed companion? Given her conspicuous penchant for luxury, the gift needs to be something remarkable indeed."
